description: This is the C.R.I.T Spec Ops modified gasmask, fitted with top-of-the-line electronics and lined with Kevlar for extra protection in order to keep one's head where it should be.  Various filters and other high tech wizardry allow for enhanced oxygen intake and safety even under bombardment.  It has an integrated HUD and the option to turn it on for more features.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This is the C.R.I.T Spec Ops modified gasmask.  It is currently on and draining power for the HUD, low-level nightvision and other protective elements.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

The C.R.I.T Spec Ops Enhanced Movement vest is embedded with high-tech filaments and reactive servos which protects its wearer and assists in movement at the cost high  power usage.  It is commonly worn by C.R.I.T Spec Ops for its ease of use and manuverability.  Turn it on for suit mode, extra protection and movement.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

The C.R.I.T Spec Ops Enhanced Movement vest is embedded with high-tech filaments, reactive servos and a generator which pumps a crystallized liquid that protects its wearer from most heavy combat situations at the cost of extreme power usage.  It is commonly worn by C.R.I.T Spec Ops.  This vest is currently in suit form and draining your UPS power at high rates.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
C.R.T standard-issue helmet.  Protects the noggin and has a stretch of insulated steel mesh for neck warmth and protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

C.R.I.T standard-issue helmet.  Protects the noggin and has a stretch of insulated steel mesh for neck warmth and protection.  A tactically dim flashlight is attached to the side.  This light is currently on and drawing power.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
